    • Constructor Detail

      • SOCSettlement

        public SOCSettlement(SOCPlayer pl,
                     int co,
                     SOCBoard board)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Make a new settlement
        Parameters:
        pl - player who owns the settlement
        co - coordinates
        board - board if known; otherwise will extract from pl
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if pl null, or board null and pl.board also null
